Plot: A dramatization of the shocking Barbara Daly Baekeland murder case, which happened in a posh London flat on Friday 17 November 1972. The bloody crime caused a stir on both sides of the Atlantic and remains one of the most memorable American Tragedies...
Title: Savage Grace
Writer: Howard A. Rodman (screenplay), Natalie Robins (book), Steven M.L. Aronson (book)
Actors: Julianne Moore, Stephen Dillane, Anne Reid, Martin Huber
